name: indisputably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is true, and impossible to doubt: Segovia, she said, was indisputably the finest guitar player of the 20th century. The Prado museum indisputably holds the world’s greatest collection of Spanish paintings. See
indisputable
More examplesFewer examplesThe gallery business is indisputably a tough one. Her words strike me as indisputably wise and true.He worked with the indisputably great vocalist Aretha Franklin.
